name: Harvest Roll (NekuSoul)
description:
Harvest Roll A Dice-Seed Request Fulfillment Game

Made for Ludum Dare 52

Instructions
  • Plant dice by dragging them into the field and get new dice next turn.
  • Fulfill requests from the town by dragging them onto the WTB cards.
  • Keep in mind that the harvested dice will vary in quality and yield (indicated by the leafs).
  • Be careful not to have more dice at the end of the turn than you can hold in your bag or you will be penalized.
  • Every now and then you can upgrade the size of your bag or the amount of fields you own.
  • Failure to pay your bills in time will result in a Game Over.
Made By
  • Glimmer
  • NekuSoul
